sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Change Activity label name in GL Balance</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sn_fin_gl_balance');
gr.addQuery('element', 'current_period_activity');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
    var newValues = {
        'label': 'Activity since last cert period',
        'plural': 'Activity since last cert period'
    };
    var ptGlobal = new global.PTGlobalAPI();
    ptGlobal.updateDictionary(gr, newValues);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-04-30 10:21:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>43ae6fe0c7a85010a3bdb6f827c260e0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Change Activity label name in GL Balance</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">067a068f53312300a3bd2a2db5dc3407</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">067a068f53312300a3bd2a2db5dc3407</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_43ae6fe0c7a85010a3bdb6f827c260e0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-30 10:21:10</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Change Activity label name in GL Balance
